nl.esciencecenter.esight

Class ESightNewtWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.ESightNewtWindow

  • public class ESightNewtWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    Common (extendible) class for a stand alone native supported OpenGL window.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ESightNewtWindow(boolean forceGL2ES2, InputHandler inputHandler, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener glEventListener, int width, int height, java.lang.String windowTitle)
      Constructor for this class.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ESightNewtWindow

        public ESightNewtWindow(boolean forceGL2ES2,
                InputHandler inputHandler,
                javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener glEventListener,
                int width,
                int height,
                java.lang.String windowTitle)
        Constructor for this class. Sets up the window and enables common features like anti-aliasing and hardware acceleration.
        Parameters:
        forceGL2ES2 - Force GL2ES2 support (default on), currently Unused
        inputHandler - A predefined InputHandler that is added as event handler for input events.
        glEventListener - A predefined GLEventListener that is added as event handler for openGL events.
        width - The initial window width.
        height - The initial window height.
        windowTitle - The window title.
